featured.description:
Mango Markets provides a single venue to lend, borrow, swap, and leverage-trade crypto assets through a powerful risk engine. 

Mango Markets is built on the Solana blockchain and utilizes Serum DEX for spot margin trading while perpetual futures are traded on Mango Markets' own order book. Mango Markets is governed by MNGO token holders via the Mango DAO.
featured.howToJoin: Buy $MNGO token and deposit the tokens into Mango Dao to start participating.
featured.features:
- Trading 
- Borrow & Lend
- Spot Margin
- Perpetual Futures 
- Market Making Program

featured.description:
Grape Protocol is one of the largest DAO's in the ecosystem. 

The grape protocol and community have several products and services filling needs from product feedback, to discord wallet verification, to a whole NFT marketplace for your next NFT launch. 

There is lot of room to be involved in the DAO and join a community of incredibly passionate builders. Get involved today by joining the discord server!
featured.howToJoin: Buy $GRAPE token and deposit the tokens into Grape Dao to start participating.
featured.features:
- Social NFT Marketplace 
- Grape Access Verification 
- Community Driven DAO 
- Marketing and Branding 
- Dean's List Feedback

featured.description:
MonkeDAO is a curated community of monkes. 

We’re working to become the premier decentralized community of Web3, by providing unparalleled value to our members and the Solana ecosystem through community-led projects, connections and innovations.
featured.howToJoin: Buy a SMB (Solana Monkey Business) NFT to gain access to the community and dao.

featured.description: Metaplex makes it easy to build your project in minutes and grow your community in the world’s largest NFT ecosystem.
featured.howToJoin: Purchase $MPLX from an exchange or go to https://claim.metaplex.com/unavailable to claim your free $MPLX if you are elligible.

tooling.description:
Realms is an end to end DAO solution for Solana DAOs built by the Solana team and community. 

Easily spin up a new NFT, multi sig wallet or community dao in a few minutes in the no code dao creation wizard. 

Manage your community, treasury and proposals transparently and resistant to censorship from Realms web app.
tooling.features:
- No Code DAO creation tool
- Multi Sig Wallet, NFT DAO, Community DAO 
- Custom and Flexible Governance 
- Invest and stake directly from treasury 
- Proposal Notifications

tooling.description:
NATION is a way for communities to create change. We're building a new way for communities to raise money and create change. 

A Nation of communities pooling resources to produce films, propel companies, purchase assets, promote philanthropy. 

To do things together that are not possible alone.  The status quo favors the few with resources. The future favors the resources of the many. Nation aims to prove that point.
tooling.features:
- Full flow of creating new DAOs 
- Explore the Solana DAO ecosystem 
- Fundraise for your cause 
- Organize to create change

tooling.description:
Civic provides identity services for Solana, including KYC, bot-resistance, uniqueness and more.

Civic adds an identity layer to your DAO, through the Civic Pass plugin. 

Example use-cases:
Sybil-resistance and one-person-one-vote
DAOs with quadratic voting systems
Location-specific DAOs
Bot-resistance
Age-gated DAOs
DAOs that require KYC
tooling.features:
- Seamless integration using the SPL-Governance Plugin system 
- A non-transferable token model to gate access to a DAO
- Intuitive UI to guide users to obtain the identity token

tooling.description:
Dialect is the first protocol for smart messaging — dynamic, composable dapp notifications and wallet-to-wallet chat. 

Dialect enables a more engaging dapp experience with timely, targeted messages and notifications. 

Get up & running with just a few lines of code using Dialect's open source, out-of-the-box tooling. We’ll keep shipping new features while you’re busy building the future of DeFi / DAOs / NFTs / GameFi / Solana.
tooling.features:
- Wallet-to-wallet messaging 
- Dapp notifications (direct-to-wallet, email, SMS, and telegram)
- Blockchain monitoring for triggering notifications

tooling.description:
Unique Venture Clubs (Unique.vc) is a platform that allows people to quickly and securely pool resources, establish customizable on-chain governance structures and collectively own assets without knowing a single line of code. 

Our vision is to democratize investing and asset management by creating strong self-governed communities with common financial goals.
tooling.features:
- No code fast and simple club creation
- Fully customizable governance
- NFT trading and management 
- Raise and manage funds
- Seamless investing

tooling.description:
Squads is a multi-signature management protocol for web3 native teams. 

Squads enables anyone to create a multi-signature wallet in minutes, is the cheapest option across blockchains, and has numerous features built on top of the multisig primitive to enhance the multisig experience. Squads makes it easy for web3 teams to manage their on-chain assets,  facilitating seamless on chain collaboration and co-ownership.
tooling.features:
- Create Multi-sig quickly
- Create and Vote on transactions
- Manage multi-sig assets in vaults
- Earn yield on vaults

treasury.description:
Castle provides the safest way to earn yield for DAOs and their communities. 

Built specifically for your DAO's risk/return needs. 

The Vault product is a risk-managed, low-maintenance savings account that safely earns yield across a diversified set of DeFi protocols.
treasury.features:
- Risk-Managed Vaults
- Yield and Vault Reporting
- Automated low risk and maximal yield

treasury.description:
Streamflow is a suite of products that enables organizations (and individuals) to distribute funds in a simple and straightforward manner. 

Our vision is to make basic crypto-native financial workflows not suck.

Our initial suite of products includes a protocol for streaming payments and solutions for token vesting and progressive payroll built on top of it. In addition, we're bringing one-to-many payments and multisig vaults on Solana.
treasury.features:
- Token Vesting
- Stream Payments
- Batch Payments
- Multisig wallet (coming soon)

treasury.description:
Solend is the autonomous interest rate machine for lending on Solana.

Earn interest and borrow 16 assets across 46 pools on the fastest, lowest fee, and most scalable lending protocol.
treasury.features:
- Earn Interest
- Borrow 
- Leverage long
- Short
